name: Sugar Box
description:
Sugar Box - Minimalistic beautiful puzzle game in which you need to help insects pick up sugar
Break down the blocks to drop the sugar box to the ground
In total, you are given 3 attempts if you can not manage for 3 that level of fail
The levels in the game are not complex, so it can be played by everyone.

The game will be updated and new levels and features will appear


Features:
- Beautiful backgrounds
- Minimalistic graphics
- Physical Puzzle
- 60 levels
- Low system requirements
- Trade Card
- Low price
